messages.title: LET'S GET BREXIT DONE
messages.content: AND UNLEASH BRITAIN'S POTENTIAL A strong economy, More jobs and lower taxes, Billions extra for our NHS, schools and police

messages.title: JUST NINE SEATS FROM A MAJORITY GOVERNMENT
messages.content: It's a hung Parliament or a Conservative majority in this election and your vote will decide. Last time tactical maneuvering by the opposition parties prevented Conservatives from securing a majority. That means your vote will count more than ever. A vote for anyone other than the Conservatives means the chaos of another hung Parliament with Jeremy Corbyn as Prime Minister.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: To cut the cost of living

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Extra money for schools and more help for families
Securing the future of our NHS with extra 33.9 billion
Protecting our environment for future generations
Cutting crime to ensure we feel safe to walk our streets
Reducing immigration with a fairer system

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Jeremy Corbyn, Nicola Sturgeon, Jo Swinson
mentions.tacticalSituation: It's a hung Parliament or a Conservative majority in this election and your vote will decide.
